List<Pixel> edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.Line.getPositionIn ( LatLonGrid  grid  )  

00057                                                      {
00058         List<Pixel> result = new ArrayList<Pixel>();
00059         Pixel p0 = grid.getPixel( new LatLon(lat0, lon0) );
00060         Pixel p1 = grid.getPixel( new LatLon(lat1, lon1) );
00061         System.out.println("Line from " + p0 + " to " + p1);
00062         int rowlen = Math.abs(p0.getRow() - p1.getRow());
00063         int collen = Math.abs(p0.getCol() - p1.getCol());
00064         // avoid divide by zero in slope calculations below
00065         if ( rowlen == 0 && collen == 0){
00066             result.add(p0);
00067             return result;
00068         }
00069         if ( rowlen > collen ){
00070             // increment in row
00071             int startrow = Math.min(p0.getRow(), p1.getRow());
00072             int endrow = Math.max(p0.getRow(), p1.getRow());
00073             double slope = (p1.getCol() - p0.getCol())/((double)(p1.getRow()-p0.getRow()));
00074             for (int row=startrow; row <= endrow; ++row){
00075                 int col = (int) Math.round(slope*(row-p0.getRow())+p0.getCol());
00076                 if (grid.isValid(row, col)){
00077                     result.add( new Pixel(row, col, grid.getValue(row, col)) );
00078                 }
00079             }
00080         } else {
00081             int startcol = Math.min(p0.getCol(), p1.getCol());
00082             int endcol = Math.max(p0.getCol(), p1.getCol());
00083             double slope = (p1.getRow()-p0.getRow())/((double)(p1.getCol()-p0.getCol()));
00084             for (int col=startcol; col <= endcol; ++col){
00085                 int row = (int) Math.round(slope*(col-p0.getCol())+p0.getRow());
00086                 if (grid.isValid(row, col)){
00087                     result.add( new Pixel(row, col, grid.getValue(row, col)) );
00088                 }
00089             }
00090         }
00091         return result;
00092     }

Double edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.Line.getXIntercept ( double  y  ) 

Find the intersection point.

Returns null if not in range. 

00100                                           {
00101         if (!isBetween(lon0, y, lon1)) {
00102             return null;
00103         }
00104         // if y0=y1, then inrange would be false
00105         double x;
00106         if (lon0 != lon1) {
00107             x = lat0 + (y - lon0) * (lat1 - lat0) / (lon1 - lon0);
00108         } else {
00109             x = (lat1 + lat0) / 2;
00110         }
00111         return x;
00112     }

Double edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.Line.getYIntercept ( double  x  ) 

Find the intersection point.

Returns null if not in range. 

00115                                           {
00116         if (!isBetween(lat0, x, lat1)) {
00117             return null;
00118         }
00119         double y;
00120         if (lat0 != lat1) {
00121             y = lon0 + (x - lat0) * (lon1 - lon0) / (lat1 - lat0);
00122         } else {
00123             y = (lon1 + lon0) / 2;
00124         }
00125         return y;
00126     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.rasterization.Line.main ( String  args[]  )  throws Exception [static] 

00128                                                             {
00129         LatLonGrid grid = new LatLonGrid(100,100,0,new LatLon(100,-90),0.01,0.01);
00130         List<Pixel> ver = new Line(99.3,-89.3,99.7,-89.4).getPositionIn(grid);
00131         List<Pixel> hor = new Line(99.3,-89.3,99.4,-89.7).getPositionIn(grid);
00132         for (Pixel p : ver){
00133             grid.setValue(p.getRow(), p.getCol(), 10);
00134         }
00135         for (Pixel p : hor){
00136             grid.setValue(p.getRow(), p.getCol(), 20);
00137         }
00138         
00139         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("raster");
00140         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "drawlines", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00141     }
